fields.Title: TEST / END TITLES TEST FOR ROZZO
Shivers: "Under the night sky the great distr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the night sky the great district sleeps: A dark chessboard of wooden houses in the rain, 80,000 living souls inside. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41 atop the motorway, to Boogie Street glowing on the rainswept horizon...

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the night sky the great distr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the night sky the great district sleeps: A chessboard of old wooden houses in the snow, 80,000 living souls inside. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41 atop the motorway, to Boogie Street glowing on the horizon...

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fuck it, let's go." The man points..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck it, let's go." The man points down the street. "Trant left his motor carriage behind the gates. It's a 20 minute drive to Jamrock."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Good bye, Harry. And -- I know it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good bye, Harry. And -- I know it won't happen, but..." He looks at you, heart steeled and eyes cold.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the evening sky the great dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the evening sky the great district turns on its lights: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls inside. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41 atop the motorway, to Boogie Street forking into the dark horizon...

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the evening sky the great dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the evening sky the great district turns on its lights: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls inside. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41 atop the motorway, to Boogie Street forking into the snowswept horizon...

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the noonday sky the great dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the noonday sky the great district hums: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls and chimney stacks. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41. To Boogie Street forking into the snowswept horizon...

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Wonderful," the woman looks north...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wonderful," the woman looks north. "Then can we please just go back to Jamrock now?"

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: "Let's test. This is the last hub."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let's test. This is the last hub.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the evening sky the great dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the evening sky the great district turns on its lights: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls inside. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41 atop the motorway, to Boogie Street disappearing into the rain on the horizon...

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""Torson?" "Yes." "McLaine?" "Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text:
"Torson?"
"Yes."
"McLaine?"
"Yes."
"Heidelstam?"
"No."
"Vicquemare?"
"Yes."
"Du Bois?"
"Of course."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the noonday sky the great dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the noonday sky the great district hums: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls and chimney stacks. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41, to Boogie Street forking into the snowswept horizon...

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the pink morning sky the grea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the pink morning sky the great district wakes: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls and chimney stacks. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41, to Boogie Street forking into the snowswept horizon...

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the night sky the great distr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the night sky the great district sleeps: A black chessboard of old wooden houses, 80,000 living souls inside. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41 atop the motorway, to Boogie Street forking into the darkened horizon...

fields.Title: You: ""I'm ready." (End with Kim / Cuno.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm ready." (End with Kim / Cuno.)

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the violet morning sky the gr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the violet morning sky the great district wakes: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls and chimney stacks. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41, to Boogie Street forking into the glowing horizon...

fields.Title: Jump to: [Shivers: "You close your eyes and hear the do..."]
Esprit de Corps: "Even now -- you're his colleague."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even now -- you're his colleague.

fields.Title: Shivers: "A grey rain falls on Martinaise. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A grey rain falls on Martinaise. The city soaks in it, cold and dripping. Waves hit the concrete breakers. The homeless huddle by the fires behind the fences. There, among the shacks, is your home. Stay. Have a drink. Forever.

fields.Title: Shivers: "The great district hums with the no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The great district hums with the noise of human habitation: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Grand Couron, from Precinct 41 to Boogie Street forking into the distant horizon...

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the violet morning sky the gr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the violet morning sky the great district wakes: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls and chimney stacks. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41. To Boogie Street forking into the glowing horizon...

fields.Title: Jump to: [Judit Minot: ""Wonderful," the woman looks north...."]
Jean Vicquemare: "Let's test. This is the last hub."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let's test. This is the last hub.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the violet morning sky the gr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the violet morning sky the great district wakes: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls and chimney stacks. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41, to Boogie Street forking into the rainswept horizon...

fields.Title: You: ""Good bye, then." (End alone.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good bye, then." (End alone.)

fields.Title: Shivers: "The great district hums with the no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The great district hums with the noise of human habitation: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Grand Couron, from Precinct 41 to Boogie Street forking into the distant horizon...

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the night sky the great distr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the night sky the great district sleeps: A black chessboard of old wooden houses, 80,000 living souls inside. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41 atop the motorway, to Boogie Street forking into the darkened horizon...

fields.Title: Shivers: "The great district hums in the slow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The great district hums in the slowly falling snow: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls and chimney stacks. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41. To Boogie Street forking into the white horizon...

fields.Title: Shivers: "Under the night sky the great distr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under the night sky the great district sleeps: A dark chessboard of wooden houses in the rain, 80,000 living souls inside. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41 atop the motorway, to Boogie Street glowing on the rainswept horizon...

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""*If* you make it -- if you've been..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*If* you make it -- if you've been sober for 10 months -- tell us. I'll work with you again. But not like this. Never like this again. This is over."

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""Good." She looks at you, then Vicq..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." She looks at you, then Vicquemare...

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""Really?" Nix Gottlieb looks up fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text:
"Really?" Nix Gottlieb looks up from the list. "I hear he's quite unstable."
"You say that like it's a *bad* thing," Captain Ptolemy Pryce points his pen at the doctor. It's dim in his office and the curtains are drawn. "Harry's our man, he'll pull through -- and when he does he'll side with Revachol."
"Understood." Gottlieb returns to the list. "Minot?"
"Of course."
fields.Alternate1:
"Really?" Nix Gottlieb looks up from the list. "I hear he's unstable."
"You say that like it's a *bad* thing," Captain Ptolemy Pryce gestures with a ball point pen. It's dim in the office and the curtains are drawn. "Harry's our man, he'll pull through. When he does he'll side with the people."
"Understood." Gottlieb returns to the list. "Minot?"
"Of course."
fields.Alternate2:
"Really?" Nix Gottlieb looks up from the list. "I hear he's unstable."
"You say that like it's a *bad* thing," Captain Ptolemy Pryce gestures with a ball point pen. It's dim in the office and the curtains are drawn. "Harry's our man, he'll pull through. When he does he'll side with the RCM."
"Understood." Gottlieb returns to the list. "Minot?"
"Of course."
fields.Alternate3:
"Really?" Nix Gottlieb looks up from the list. "I hear he's unstable."
"You say that like it's a *bad* thing," Captain Ptolemy Pryce gestures with a ball point pen. It's dim in the office and the curtains are drawn. "Harry's our man, he'll pull through. He's always been... money over bitches."
"Understood." Gottlieb returns to the list. "Minot?"
"Of course."
fields.Alternate4:
"Really?" Nix Gottlieb looks up from the list. "I hear he's quite unstable."
"You say that like it's a *bad* thing," Captain Ptolemy Pryce gestures with a ball point pen. It's dim in the office and the curtains are drawn. "Harry's our man, he'll pull through. When he does he'll side with Revachol."
"Understood." Gottlieb returns to the list. "Minot?"
"Of course."

fields.Dialogue Text: The great district hums in the falling rain: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Grand Couron, from Precinct 41 to Boogie Street forking into the rainswept horizon...

fields.Title: Shivers: "The great district hums in the fall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The great district hums in the falling rain: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Grand Couron, from Precinct 41 to Boogie Street forking into the rainswept horizon...

fields.Title: Shivers: "You close your eyes and hear the do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You close your eyes and hear the dogs bark. A lone woman sits by a factory window, dreaming of meteorite strikes. On Rue Saint-Gérôme a square bullet slides into a square-shaped chamber. In Old South a man without eyelids smiles. Spring has come. It's time.

fields.Title: Shivers: "The great district hums in the slow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The great district hums in the slowly falling snow: A chessboard of wooden houses, 80,000 living souls and chimney stacks. Firetraps as far as the eye can see -- from Main Street to Precinct 41, to Boogie Street forking into the white horizon...

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""Torson?" "Yes." "McLaine?" "Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text:
"Torson?"
"Yes."
"McLaine?"
"Yes."
"Heidelstam?"
"No."
"Vicquemare?"
"Yes."
"Du Bois?"
"Yes."

fields.Title: You: ""Here are many options before leavi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Here are many options before leaving."
